long_description: With a padded harness and durable frame, the Kelty Sanitas Pack comfortably hauls a sleeping bag, tent, and other gear. Designed for ages 8 - 12, the Sanitas is perfect for scouting and family trips. External-frame suspension adjusts to fit growing torsos and features padded shoulder straps, sternum strap and removable padded hipbelt. Top-loading main compartment contains a hydration sleeve (reservoir sold separately). The Kelty Sanitas Pack features zippered side pockets, ice-axe loops, lash tabs and a hold-open bar.
short_description: With a padded harness and durable frame, the Kelty Sanitas Pack comfortably hauls a sleeping bag, tent, and other gear. Designed for ages 8 - 12, the Sanitas is perfect for scouting and family trips.
